bPreviewLive: Preview the live physics object on the mesh
bShowLinearLimits: Show linear (prismatic) limits in the viewport
bShowAngularLimits: Show angular limit ranges in the viewport
bShowPlanarLimit: Show planar limit info (actual plane, plane normal) in the viewport
bShowSphericalLimit: Show spherical limits in the viewport (preview live only)
bShowCollisionSpheres: If planar limits are enabled and the collision mode isn't CoM, draw sphere collision sizes
